In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

    In present generation there is a lot of demand  for health care  due to changes in the life style of  individuals, but there is no proper availabilities which are required for health care sector .

      According to my opinion there is lot of gap in health care supply and demand especially in India due to  some rules and regulations that as to be followed by the government of India to increase the health care in India as  some counties are adopting some rules to enter India still now. AS the living styles and purchasing power of individuals are increasing day by day in India due to this reason  few countries are showing interest to enter India as there is a lot demand in health care as individuals in India are more concern  about their and their families life's

        As there is no proper technical skills, standard skills that are required for the healthcare sector to fulfill the requirements especially in India which required to satisfy the individuals patients. Even the government of India is not focusing interest in health care sector where there is an tremendous increase in economic growth.

           As per my opinion the government of India should follow certain rules to increase the health care in India like, firstly identify the areas where health care sector in important which is required to  protect the health the individuals who required it.

    Secondly use the latest technology where it can save the individuals life within the time  and their families and nextly they should focus on rural areas where there no proper facilities which required for basic needs still now And this can done with the help of conducting camps in rural areas to know how important it is in one's life. Identify the skills which are required for fulfilling the needs of patient health, this can done by giving proper training, motivation and on the job practice. The above mentioned rules can be done  by the government only after realising how important in one's life and how it increase the economic growth this can be done with the help of other countries who are ready to enter India

      So  lastly  I want to say that health care sector increases the individuals and their families desires and also protects their life's and also increases the job oppurnities which changes the individuals fulfilments.
